::Slayer::

Slayer jumps back, but Megaton's teeth still dig into his armor a little, tearing out some plates as he pulls back. He growls, jumping backwards.

"Way to count to three," he mumbles, his missile launcher firing two missiles at Megaton's snout.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton glares down at Slayer, taking a quick glance at Zoe now and again.
> "Why does it always seem to be wolves that give me problems?" he thinks
> knowing that the only real opponent he'd had so far was Lunarpine.
> 
> "I'll be sporting and give you till the count of three to turn tail and
> run." He stares keeping his poker face. The dragon raises a large scaled
> claw and holds up the first claw "1"
> 
> "Without giving another warning he snaps his jaws forward at about waist
> level trying to bite Slayer in half. (Since Slayers a TM it would probably
> take more than one bite, either that or give him heartburn)
